Description: Ostracon (?), fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery vessel, the fabric is partially coloured off-white in section, the interior is spotted with traces of an off-white granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a mottled grey-brown slip and the Register records traces of a Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394710) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394710)
